item.title: Today's talk: 10 data management automation projects making work faster, safer and stronger
item.description: In March 2023, I gave a talk at company’s annual Digital Expo. The three images illustrate the high-level ideas: what was the problem to be solved? ten deliverables methodology Interested to know more? I can be reached at rong dot lu at bp dot com.
